description: The Polo Soft fit puts a modern spin on classic preppy style with a natural shoulder and half-canvassed construction. This version is crafted from fine camel hair twill that was sourced from the esteemed Joshua Ellis mill in England.
fitting_details: Polo Soft: trim fit, with a natural shoulder, a high armhole, 4.25" lapels, and a shorter length.
Size 40R has a 29.75" front body length, a 29.5" back body length, and a 17.5" sleeve inseam.
Peak lapels. Buttonhole at the left lapel. Double-breasted silhouette.
Left chest welt pocket. Two front waist flapped pockets. Two interior chest pockets.
Shell: 100% camel hair. Undercollar: 50% linen, 43% wool, 7% viscose. Body lining: 100% cupro. Sleeve lining: 52% viscose, 48% acetate.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size 40R.
product: Polo Soft Camel Hair Sport Coat
